author: Jonathan Shieber
title: Curative received FDA emergency use authorization for its novel COVID-19 tests
description: The diagnostics startup Curative has received an emergency use authorization from the Food and Drug Administration for its novel test to determine COVID-19 infection. The company says that its tests have already been used by the City of Los Angeles since late…
content:
The diagnostics startup Curative has received an emergency use authorization from the Food and Drug Administration for its novel test to determine COVID-19 infection.
The company says that its tests have already been used by the City of Los Angeles since lat… [+5464 chars]
